snippet: Pittsburgh Pirates infielder Jung Ho Kang received a suspended two-year prison sentence for fleeing the scene after crashing a car into a guardrail while driving under the influence of alcohol....

headline.main: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform
headline.print_headline: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform

lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Pirates infielder Jung Ho Kang received a suspended two-year prison sentence for fleeing the scene after crashing a car into a guardrail while driving under the influence of alcohol.
